version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Initial commit: Create metapackage of RCPlugs

version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Remove superfluous UINT32_MAX line Replace M_PI with $pi

version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Add chmaha to RCCompressor name

version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: NO-OP: Fix desc gaps

version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Create CD Markers: Add default 200ms marker/region offset PDF Guide: Reference 35ms crossfades in manual set-up and editing sections New: ReaClassical Preferences (see screenshot above) S-D edits: All S-D editing scripts use xfade value from RC Preferences Create CD Markers: Better CD frame snapping to account for decimal values Create CD Markers: Warning if any CD audio tracks are less than 4 seconds in length Create CD Markers: Enforce 1-second minimum for INDEX0 before a # track S-D Edit: Fix 3-point right-hand crossfading using new API S-D Edit: Further code clean-up Create CD Markers: Add space at start of project if not enough room for chosen offset Create CD Markers: Refine adding space at start of project for offset ReaClassical Preferences: Make project-based ReaClassical Preferences: Add album lead-out (postgap) as a customizable value Create CD Markers: Place metadata marker relative to =END marker S-D editing scripts: Use project extstate for S-D edit length Create CD Markers: Use project extstate for custom lengths New: Rearrange CD Tracks (left/right) Rearrange CD Tracks: Add guard clause for no selected item New themes: Sequoia Blue, Sequoia Green and Pyramix New themes: Make selected item color #ff7608 New Theme: SaDiE New Function: Explode Multi-Channel Item(s) SaDiE theme: adjust colors to blend with arrange window and add black peak edges New Theme: Sonic Solutions New: Colorize (add a custom color to an item and those in the same group) Colorize: Unselect item(s) at the end of the function Colorize: Add undo block Move Track Right: Select only first item of the track before dialog appears Add Aux/Submix: Scroll to top of project after adding track Retain muted guide tracks during fade editor auditioning Split Whole Project View function into separate horizontal and vertical zoom functions Whole Project View functions: Remove superfluous undo blocks etc S-D Edit function: Respect existing edits contained within the source markers Insert with time-stretching: Respect existing edits contained within the source markers by gluing Insert with time-stretching: Remove superfluous functions and variables

version.name: 23.21pre1
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: PDF Guide: Various tweaks

version.name: 23.21pre2
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Create Folder: Add track grouping

version.name: 23.21pre3
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Classical Take Record: Allow for pausing and then returning to original start position for next recording

version.name: 23.21pre4
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Classical Take Record: Keep next folder group rec-armed for continued monitoring Classical Take Record: Show only folder track as selected Classical Take Record: Always show next rec-armed folder group in mixer

version.name: 23.21pre5
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: S-D functions: NO-OP code beautification

version.name: 23.21pre6
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: NO-OP: Code beautification part 2 NO-OP: Revise previous commit to use 4-space indentation

version.name: 23.21pre7
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: NO-OP: Code beautification part 3

version.name: 23.21pre8
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Move CD Track Left/Right: Treat crossfaded CD track starts as part of same group Move CD Track Left/Right: Use better variable names for current item position

version.name: 23.21pre9
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Shift CD Track Left/Right: Don't allow moving CD tracks whose start overlaps with previous item

version.name: 23.21pre10
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Whole Project View Vertical: Respect child track visibility

version.name: 23.21pre11
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: S-D Edit: Prematurely end function by cleaning up if there are no source media items to select

version.name: 23.21pre12
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Classical Crossfade Editor: Only enter mode if user selects an item on track 1 Create CD Markers: Add ReaClassical metadata via MESSAGE key

version.name: 23.21pre13
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Create CD Markers: Add Redbook standard checks for number of tracks (<= 99) and length of CD (< 79.57 minutes)

version.name: 23.21pre14
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Whole Project View (Horizontal): Move edit cursor to start of project to make sure zoom works as expected

version.name: 23.21pre15
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Various: Replace any reaper prefixes with r

version.name: 23.21pre16
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Various: Use for key in pairs(reaper) do _G[key] = reaper[key] end Various: Remove commented out code

version.name: 23.21pre17
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Bugfix: Fade editor, Reposition CD Tracks & Create CD Markers

version.name: 23.21pre18
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Various: Move local variable creation inside of main function (again!) and pass to other functions Various: Add missing arguments and parameters

version.name: 23.21pre19
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: RoomTone: Prepare existing functions for RoomTone function

version.name: 23.21pre20
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Prepare Takes: Provide cancel option on initial dialog

version.name: 23.21pre21
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Edit Classical Crossfade: Add return line when function is tried outside of fade editor mode

version.name: 23.21pre22
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Duplicate Folder: Force user to select a parent track Duplicate Folder: Fix selection of track after function has completed

version.name: 23.21pre23
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Classical Take Record: Force user to select parent track

version.name: 23.21pre24
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Help: Switch to Jekyll-based manual (currently just a skeleton) Remove PDF Guide from metapackage

version.name: 23.21pre25
version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Room Tone: Add rudimentary dedicated room tone track

version.author: chmaha
version.changelog: Room Tone: Add rudimentary dedicated room tone track Classical Take Record: Force user to select parent track Duplicate Folder: Force user to select a parent track Duplicate Folder: Fix selection of track after function has completed Edit Classical Crossfade: Add return line when function is tried outside of fade editor mode Prepare Takes: Provide cancel option on initial dialog RoomTone: Prepare existing functions for RoomTone function Various: Move local variable creation inside of main function (again!) and pass to other functions Various: Add missing arguments and parameters Bugfix: Fade editor, Reposition CD Tracks & Create CD Markers Various: Use for key in pairs(reaper) do _G[key] = reaper[key] end Various: Remove commented out code Various: Replace any reaper prefixes with r Whole Project View (Horizontal): Move edit cursor to start of project to make sure zoom works as expected Create CD Markers: Add Redbook standard checks for number of tracks (<= 99) and length of CD (< 79.57 minutes) Classical Crossfade Editor: Only enter mode if user selects an item on track 1 Create CD Markers: Add ReaClassical metadata via MESSAGE key S-D Edit: Prematurely end function by cleaning up if there are no source media items to select Whole Project View Vertical: Respect child track visibility Shift CD Track Left/Right: Don't allow moving CD tracks whose start overlaps with previous item Move CD Track Left/Right: Treat crossfaded CD track starts as part of same group Move CD Track Left/Right: Use better variable names for current item position NO-OP: Code beautification part 3 NO-OP: Code beautification part 2 NO-OP: Revise previous commit to use 4-space indentation S-D functions: NO-OP code beautification Classical Take Record: Keep next folder group rec-armed for continued monitoring Classical Take Record: Show only folder track as selected Classical Take Record: Always show next rec-armed folder group in mixer Classical Take Record: Allow for pausing and then returning to original start position for next recording Create Folder: Add track grouping PDF Guide: Various tweaks
